org.drip.analytics.definition

Class FXForwardCurve

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.service.stream.Serializer
      • org.drip.analytics.definition.FXForwardCurve
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Curve, LatentState
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DerivedFXForward

    public abstract class FXForwardCurve
extends Serializer
implements Curve
    FXForwardCurve implements the curve representing the FXForward nodes. It extends the Curve class, and exposes the following functionality: - Retrieve the spot parameters (FX Spot, Spot Date, and the currency pair) - Calculate the Zero set of FX Basis/Zero Rate nodes corresponding to each basis node - Bootstrap basis points/discount curves corresponding to the FXForward node set - Imply the zero rate to a given date from the FXForward curve

        Parameters:
        valParam - ValuationParams
